Field.ElementLabel: Subject Initials:
Date:
Visit:

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
EATING QUESTIONNAIRE

Instructions:

The following questions are concerned with the PAST FOUR WEEKS ONLY (28 days). Please read each question carefully and choose the appropriate number. Please answer all the questions.

ON HOW MANY DAYS OUT OF THE PAST 28 DAYS...
Field.ElementLabel: 1. Have you been deliberately trying to limit the amount of food you eat to influence your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 2. Have you gone for long periods of time (8 hours or more) without eating anything in order to influence your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 3. Have your tried to avoid eating any foods which you like in order to influence your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 4. Have you <u>tried</u> to follow definite rules regarding your eating in order to influence your shape or weight; for example, a calorie limit, a set amount of food, or rules about what or when you should eat?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 5. Have you wanted your stomach to be empty?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 6. Has thinking about food and its calorie content made it much more difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in; for example, read, watch TV, or follow a conversation?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 7. Have you been afraid of losing control over eating?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 8. Have you had episodes of binge eating?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 9. Have you eaten in secret? (Do not count binges)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 10. Have you definitely wanted your stomach to be flat?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 11. Has thinking about shape or weight made it more difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in; for example read, watch TV or follow a conversation?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 12. Have you had a definite fear that you might gain weight or become fat?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 13. Have you felt fat?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 14. Have you had a strong desire to lose weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel:
15. OVER THE PAST FOUR WEEKS (28 DAYS)

On what proportion of times that you have eaten have
you felt guilty because the effect on your shape or weight?
(Do not count binges).

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - None of the times 
 1, 1 A few of the times 
 2, 2 Less than half the times 
 3, 3 Half the times 
 4, 4 More than half the times 
 5, 5 Most of the time 
 6, 6 Every time

Field.ElementLabel:
16. Over the past four weeks (28days)
Have there been any times when you have felt that you have eaten what other people would regard as an unusually large amount of food given the circumstances?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 0, 0 - NO \n 1, 1 - YES

Field.ElementLabel: 17. How many such episodes have you had over the past four weeks?
18. During how many of these episodes of overeating did you have a sense of having lost control over your eating?
19. Have you had other episodes of eating in which you have had a sense of having lost control and eaten too much, but have <u>not</u> eaten an unusually large amount of food given the circumstances?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 0, 0 - NO \n 1, 1 - YES

Field.ElementLabel: 20. How many of such episodes have you had over the past four weeks?
21. Over the past four weeks have you made yourself sick (vomit) as a means of controlling your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 0, 0 - NO \n 1, 1 - YES

Field.ElementLabel: 22. How many times have you done this over the past four weeks?
23. Have you taken laxatives as a means of controlling your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 0, 0 - NO \n 1, 1 - YES

Field.ElementLabel: 24. How many times have you done this over the past four weeks?
25. Have you taken diuretics (water tablets) as a means of controlling your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 0, 0 - NO \n 1, 1 - YES

Field.ElementLabel: 26. How many times have you done this over the past four weeks?
27. Have you exercised <u>hard</u> as a means of controlling your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 0, 0 - NO \n 1, 1 - YES

Field.ElementLabel: 28. How many times have you done this over the past four weeks?

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: OVER THE PAST FOUR WEEKS (28 DAYS) Please choose the number which best describes your behavior.
Field.ElementLabel: 29. Has your weight influenced how you think (judge) yourself as a person?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - NOT AT ALL 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - SLIGHTLY 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - MODERATELY 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - MARKEDLY

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - NOT AT ALL 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - SLIGHTLY 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - MODERATELY 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - MARKEDLY

 1, 1

 3, 3 
 4, 4 - MODERATELY 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - MARKEDLY

 3, 3 
 4, 4 - MODERATELY 
 5, 5
